attributes.action: Exempt French expats from the Covid tests when returning to the UK from France.
attributes.additional_details: The Government should wave the Covid test kit for French expatriates when returning to the UK after visiting their family in France.
attributes.background: French expatriates should be able to visit their families in France without having to pay a very expensive test package when coming back to the UK. Most expatriates haven’t seen their family for a while and can’t afford it . This isn’t just for holiday but this is a mental health matter.
